title: Vaughn Family Endowed Child Care Scholarship Fund
description: To provide undergraduate scholarship awards for students enrolled full-time (at least 12 credit hours per semester) at CU Boulder.  Recipients will be those students who have children under school age who require daycare.
marketingContent: To provide undergraduate scholarship awards for students enrolled full-time (at least 12 credit hours per semester) at CU Boulder. Recipients will be those students who have children under school age who require daycare.
